name: Those Nights at Fredbear's
summary: Those Nights At Fredbear's was a free roam survival horror video game developed by Nikson. The game was cancelled, but way later on the 17th of July 2018, Nikson revealed a teaser trailer for a "Those Nights At Fredbear's" remake at the end of his anniversary Q&A video on The Joy of Creation: Story Mode.
